city.title: Jiufen
city.sub_title: During the first years of the Qing Dynasty, the isolated village housed nine families, thus the village would request "nine portions" every time shipments arrived from town. Later Kau-hun would become the name of the village.

city.title: Tamsui
city.sub_title: Tamsui (Hokkien POJ:Tām-chúi; Hokkien Tâi-lô:Tām-tsuí; Mandarin Pīnyīn:Dànshuǐ) is a sea-side district in New Taipei, Taiwan. It is named after the Tamsui River; the name means "fresh water".

food.title: Bubble tea
food.sub_title: Bubble tea (also known as pearl milk tea, bubble milk tea, or simply boba)
